alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford; Person; Randolph; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 01 at 3:53AM EDT until November 02 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Person, Forsyth, Guilford, Alamance, Davidson, Randolph and Stanly Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Alamance; Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford; Person; Randolph; Stanly
